img_above_text:
Casting immobilize on the Apramana Bat when it's grounded is a good way to get enough time to land some hits before it leaps into the air again, but make sure you don't cast it too early. If you freeze the Apramana Bat in the air, you might not be able to reach it with your attacks.
## Apramana Bat Spirit

img_summary: The image displays the "Equipment" menu from a video game, highlighting the "Apramaá¹‡a Bat" Spirit, categorized as "Epic." The description explains its ability, "Frost Blade," which allows the player to evade attacks by leaping into the air and unleashing freezing gusts that deal Frost Damage. If the target's Frost gauge is maxed, it can be frozen in place. The menu also shows stats, Spirit options, and the ability to equip or preview the Spirit's demo.
